Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/Jo: I must record my greatest love in my journal... oh, but what was it? Red or white wine?
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/ad: Mistria is lucky to have such a civic-minded leader.
Adeline has really grown to fill the shoes her mother and father left behind.
Adeline has so many grand plans for Mistria! I'm looking forward to seeing how her vision unfolds!
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/at: Goodness, Mistria certainly has a lot of history, doesn't it?
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/ba: Lovely to see you, my dear.
Nothing quite like a morning soak to start the day right. All your worries just melt away!
It's a bit of a walk to the bath house, but the soak is always worth it.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/be: Have you been to the beach yet, [Ari]? There's nothing more lovely than gazing at the ocean on a beautiful day.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/co: For a cozy little country town, Hemlock runs a bar worthy of the Capital! What a selection!
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/de: Once upon a time, I met Dev at a royal gala... no one told me he was a prince!
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/ei: Eiland is quite a talent at the piano. He'd be a hit at the Capital.
Did you know, he's been playing since he was tall enough to reach the keys.
I simply adore Eiland's piano-playing. I could listen for hours!
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/el: You're Mistria's most eligible, [Ari]! You seem to be capturing a lot of hearts around town.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/en: A bit of wine and a lovely day with my niece and my friend... can't rain on that!
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/eo: Now let's see... I received the most scandalous letter, and then-
Excuse me, [Ari]... I try to make notes at the end of each day, but I didn't have time for it yesterday.
Another eventful week for Great Aunt Elsie. I should do some journaling.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/fn: Don't miss the evening gathering at the Inn, [Ari]. Hemlock and Josephine host quite the little soir√©e.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/fr: He knew how to WORK a pair of tights.
I dreamt about sweet Frederick last night! Oh, he wasn't like today's men...
Except for the beard era. Not sure what that was about.
I have such fond memories of Frederick!
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/ge: There's such a variety of produce at the General Store ever since you arrived, [Ari]. A veritable cornucopia! How times do change!
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/go: I love a good bath, but half the time my visits are an excuse to gossip with Juniper. That girl loves drama.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/gr: This is a grand museum, isn't it?
My name is Elsie. I live at the Manor House with my niece and nephew, Adeline and Eiland.
Their parents, the $Baron$ and $Baroness$, spend most of their time in the Capital, especially these days.
I once did too. What grand times! But spending time in Mistria you really start to appreciate country living.
Well, be sure to stop by for a chat anytime, dear. I can share the latest $gossip$ and even some $romantic advice$, if you need it.
Oh my, now who do we have here?
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/he: Hemlock and Josephine... these two are like pieces of a puzzle that fit together. Warms my heart to see it.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/ho: I'm so looking forward to a good soak at the bath house. I hope Juni's around.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/in: Nothing in the Capital beats Reina's breakfast special! Delicious!
Nothing like some wine and chitchat to lift the spirits!
It will be nice to see the townsfolk at the Inn tonight... I hope I can make it.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/jo: "The Romance of the Prince and the Tailor" was a Capital favorite. I played Queen Celia a few years back! Standing ovations every night.
[Ari], I was just journaling about my favorite operas.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/kn: It's been a joy to see him grow up so well!
I've known Eiland since before he could peek over the keys of a piano.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/le: [Ari]! A letter from a friend in the Capital just arrived, and I've got all the latest gossip about the court!
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/ma: Between you and me, Celine volunteered to handle the ground's garden, and she's done a great job!
Sometimes an afternoon walk in the garden is just the thing! It's so lovely here.
That March is a fiery one, isn't he? But take it from me, he's all bluster.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/me: There are so many ways to describe a blush!
These springs take me back... Why, I remember taking a very romantic swim with a certain handsome Count...
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/mi: I thought I'd miss the Capital more, but Mistria's been kind to me.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/mu: There's something so romantic about history, don't you think?
It's so refreshing to take in the sights at the museum in winter!
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/ou: It's good to see you out and about! A day like this is meant for enjoying.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/pa: Oh, were we talking about dinner? My mistake.
Your palate does change as you get older. In my youth I preferred something rich, but now something distinctive is more to my taste.
The Baron and Baroness will be so proud to see what Adeline's accomplished in their absence!
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/pi: Oh, that's a lovely melody! I'm so glad they keep that grand piano tuned.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/ra: There's nothing better than a long soak on a rainy day. It saps the weariness right out of your bones.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/ro: A beautiful light in the chandelier of my life!
I was lost in thought about an old flame, Rodrigo.
There's something so romantic about the snow, don't you think?
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/si: (Elsie is occupied with her singing, you shouldn't interrupt her.)
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/st: Goodness, [Ari], the way you're stealing hearts in Mistria reminds of myself at your age. Bravo!
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/su: Sundays aren't for paperwork... they're for brunch! And mimosas. EMPHASIS mimosas.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/th: You always take the time to listen, [Ari]. You're such a sweetheart.
I'm always curious to see what Errol and Eiland are up to all day, cooped up like that in the museum. Do you think they've added another exhibit?
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/tr: All that time at the museum really inspired me. I'm going home to record my own history!
Off to dinner with the youngins and Errol! I do love to see their enthusiasm for Mistria.
What's better than a trip to the bath house? I love my little chats with Juni.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/wa: I can already smell that brisk sea air! I do so love the shore.
I'm visiting Eiland at the museum today! He's been working so hard! I'm proud of him.
We were on and off for quite a few years. She still writes me on the holidays.
Some decades ago a warlord held me for ransom, until she got to know me.
It must be a well-constructed building, but I imagine the company has something to do with it as well.
It's always nice and warm in here, no matter how cold it gets outside.
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/we: [Ari], I think we're more alike than most people know! We both love an adventure!
Some of us are simply born aunties, you see.
Have you met my darling Eiland and Adeline? I'm their Great Aunt. Well, not by blood.
It has charms the Capital could never offer. You'll see!
I know to some, Mistria may seem a tiny backwater town, but keep an open mind...
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Banked Lines/wi: I thought I'd spend this winter day putting some time in on my manuscript.
Oh, it's so nice to see you out here [Ari]! Isn't the garden beautiful in winter?
